forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: occasionally a second, unclosable keyboard will open.

comments.text: have only had this happen once, but i was writing a forum post and when it came time to write the comment instead of switching over a second keyboard appeared.
i was still able to write the comment as normal but it never went away, making my ring unusuable and foring me to restart.
thankfully that cleared up the issue.

thread.latestCommentText: thankfully that cleared up the issue.
